methods.name: AbsoluteToLocal
methods.doc:
Absolute coordinates could be either desktop or window space depending on what space the root of the widget hierarchy is in.

@return Transforms AbsoluteCoordinate into the local space of this Geometry.

methods.name: AbsoluteToViewport
EqualEqual_SlateBrush
methods.doc: Returns whether brushes A and B are identical.

methods.name: GetAbsoluteSize
methods.doc: Returns the size of the geometry in absolute space.

methods.name: GetLocalSize
methods.doc: Returns the size of the geometry in local space.

methods.name: GetLocalTopLeft
methods.doc: Returns the local top/left of the geometry in local space.

methods.name: IsUnderLocation
methods.doc:
Absolute coordinates could be either desktop or window space depending on what space the root of the widget hierarchy is in.

@return true if the provided location in absolute coordinates is within the bounds of this geometry.

methods.name: LocalToAbsolute
LocalToViewport
ScreenToViewport
methods.doc: Translates a screen position in pixels into the local space of the viewport widget.

methods.name: ScreenToWidgetAbsolute
methods.doc:
Translates a screen position in pixels into absolute application coordinates.
If bIncludeWindowPosition is true, then this method will also remove the game window's position (useful when in windowed mode).

methods.name: ScreenToWidgetLocal
methods.doc:
Translates a screen position in pixels into the local space of a widget with the given geometry.
If bIncludeWindowPosition is true, then this method will also remove the game window's position (useful when in windowed mode).
